org.haldean.chopper.pilot
Class TransmitPicture

java.lang.Object
  org.haldean.chopper.pilot.TransmitPicture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, Receivable
public final class TransmitPicture
extends Object
implements Receivable, Constants

Transmits telemetry frames to the control server.

May send the following messages to registered Receivables:

 IMAGE:
       REQUEST:DENIED (as a reply to an invalid IMAGE:SET:QUALITY:<quality> request)
       FRAMEQUALITY:<quality> (as a reply to IMAGE:GETPARAMS)
May receive the following messages from Chopper components: 
 IMAGE:
       RECEIVED
       SET:QUALITY:<quality>
       GETPARAMS

Author:
Benjamin Bardin

Method Detail

getPersistentThreadInstance

public PersistentThread getPersistentThreadInstance()
Obtains the thread that runs the telemetry transmission routines. On first call to this method, the PersistentThread is created. But since two or more instances of TransmitPicture should not be run concurrently, subsequent calls to this method return only that first thread.

Returns:
The PersistentThread that runs TransmitPicture.

getPreviewQuality

public int getPreviewQuality()
Obtains the JPEG compression quality of each transmitted frame.

Returns:
The quality.
